page.title: 04AN ORDINARY DAY,SHARON,AGE10
page.content: I get up in the morning when my alarm clock wakes me at 8 o'clock. I get out of my bed and I have a wash. Then I get dressed into my school uniform, which is green and white. For breakfast I eat Coco-Crispies with sugar and milk. Next I clean my teeth and comb my hair. I have my hair plaited or in a pony tail. Then I go to school with my friend in her Nanny's car. At school we start by having an Assembly for everyone in the hall. In our classrooms we have lessons like Mathematics, English, Stories, Nature, and Topic. I have my dinner at school in the dining room. After school I change my clothes and play in the garden until it is time for tea. After tea I watch television until it is time for bed at 9 o'clock.
